item.title: GuocoLand will be responsible for overseeing the management of both Sofitel Singapore City Centre and Sofitel Kuala Lumpur Damansara
item.description: Source: AccorHotels. Tanjong Pagar Centre. GuocoLand will oversee the operation of two new AccorHotels establishments: the Sofitel Singapore City Centre at Tanjong Pagar Centre in Singapore and the Sofitel Kuala Lumpur Damansara in Damansara City, Kuala Lumpur. These additions contribute a total of 534 rooms to AccorHotelâ€™s luxury brand. Raymond Choong, President and CEO of GuocoLand Group, expressed enthusiasm for the partnership with AccorHotels, highlighting the shared vision for creating modern, convenient spaces within bustling business districts.

item.title: Hong Leong Group has decided to establish its global headquarters at Damansara City
item.description: Source: Damansara City website. GuocoLand Malaysia’s key project, Damansara City, will soon house the Hong Leong Group’s global headquarters. The 33-story, top-tier office building, situated on the southwest side of this notable development, will be a major tenant within Damansara City when fully occupied by the second quarter of next year. The Hong Leong Group is a prominent Malaysian conglomerate with interests in banking, financial services, manufacturing, distribution, property development, investment, hospitality, leisure, and principal investment.
